title: 播放升级的声音
author: Endermen666
txt_content: 如题，怎么在游戏里播放玩家升级的声音？Java版，1.12.2，谢谢。

replies.author: Endermen666
replies.txt_content:
1652643604 发表于 2020-4-22 11:52
/playsound minecraft:entity.player.levelup player @a ~ ~ ~
那有那种很庄重的声音吗？短的那种

replies.author: Endermen666
replies.txt_content:
1652643604 发表于 2020-4-22 11:37
/playsound minecraft:entity.player.levelup player @a ~ ~ ~
那好，谢谢了！
